Title: Cartier Panthere Large 18K Yellow Gold & Steel 3-Row Bracelet Quartz Watch 27MM
Description: Cartier Panthere Large 18K Yellow Gold & Steel 3-Row Bracelet Quartz Watch 27MM  Cartier Panthere Large 18K Yellow Gold & Stainless Steel 3-Row Bracelet Quartz Watch 27MM Genuine pre-owned Cartier Panthere Large solid 18K yellow gold and stainless steel watch. The case is a square shape with a yellow gold bezel. The case measures 27mm x 27mm (not including crown) with a quartz movement. It has a cream dial, blue sword-shaped hands, second hand, date display and black roman numerals. Double hidden deployant buckle on three-row 18K yellow gold and stainless steel brushed and polished link bracelet measuring 15MM. Scratch resistant sapphire crystal and cabochon sapphire set in crown.
